Title: XamlTune
Description:
XamlTune has two main goals:
 - convert svg file to xaml files
 - automate xaml transformations in order to improve design and code integration
HomeWiki:
Project Description
XamlTune has two main goals:
  • A svg to xaml conversion library.
  • A xaml formatter that cleans and refines xaml

The current release comes with a svg2xaml command line tool and a winforms app that integrates the xaml formatter.

This project uses SharpVectors (SVG#) rendering engine.

This project is no longer being actively maintained. If you'd like to take over as maintainer, just ask!
